Once found in the grid, cups should be separated into three groups according to type.
The three types of cups are all from the same piece of pop culture.
The source of the cup types will indicate the "contents" sought for each set of cups.
Align the cups in each set so that the lowest letters spell something appropriate, then read other letters in the cups.
Three extra words found in the properly aligned sets of cups form a clue phrase in order.
